channel.title: C# MySql 2015
channel.description: I'm a beginner in C Sharp and basically I don't want to learn the bad ways of doing things. Right now I am trying to learn connecting MySql in C Sharp, I can get it too work and query but all these tutorials are from early 2000's where would I find some MySql tutorials for 2015, I don't want to use sloppy MySql which will lead too a slower program. Thanks :)

item.title: C# MySql 2015
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

I don’t think MySQL has really changed much since then. Properly build your tables, cache what you can, and you’ll generally be fine.

Read full topic
